snippet: Four Russian servicemen were killed and seven were wounded when a bomb hit their vehicle in the North Caucasus republic of Chechnya, Russia’s Interior Ministry said Thursday.
abstract: Four Russian servicemen are killed and seven wounded after bomb hits their vehicle in the North Caucasus republic of Chechnya.
lead_paragraph: Four Russian servicemen were killed and seven were wounded when a bomb hit their vehicle in the North Caucasus republic of Chechnya, Russia’s Interior Ministry said Thursday.
